  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="56737" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="56737" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.12</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="2297">2,297</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="180"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Soleil Neige</b> by <b>Tom Ford</b> is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. <b>Soleil Neige</b> was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Givaudan. Top notes are Bergamot and Carrot Seeds; middle notes are White Flowers, Orange Blossom, Jasmine, Rose and Turkish Rose; base notes are Benzoin, Vanilla and Labdanum. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html" target="_blank"                             <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">35</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Smells synthetic or like cheap potpourri to some
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">

                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">35</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Medicinal or citronella-like smell on some skin
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">

</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2367832" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367832" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pampelmousse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492943"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1492943.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pampelmousse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Granado/Oud-62792.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62792.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud"title="Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367832ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367832" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492943">Pampelmousse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-02">12/02/24 00:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>And Soleil Neige is French for “Yet another white floral?” It’s immensely likable, ubiquitous, and derivative. You’ve smelled this dozens / hundreds / thousands of times before. A jasmine adjacent hedione overdose with a tuberose accord over an amber base with the sweetness turned up to 1000 for likability. It’s well done but for hundreds of dollars less, you can have many other modern women’s perfumes from the last 30 years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2367832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2367832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2362940" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2362940" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lidiane_soares"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1297055"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1297055.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lidiane_soares" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Eau-de-Toilette-65936.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65936.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Eau de Toilette"title="Libre Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2362940ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2362940" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1297055">lidiane_soares</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-27">11/27/24 08:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried today and my first impression was “wtf! Super citrus”! But after a few minutes, around 30, changed completely to white floral.. not sweet on my skin, but well more gentle! I kinda love it now! 🤔 I’m not sure if I’ll buy it.. I have to try it again!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2362940"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2362940#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358214" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yolis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yolis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-43871.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43871.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina"title="Delina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217">Yolis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 21:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my favorite musk scent as a musk hater. By that I mean any sort of subtle skin scent. I am not that girl. I am a marshmallowy, suedey, rose, oud typa girl to my core. Musk isn't even listed! And the carrot seeds and benzoin listed in the had me scared for a second not gonna lie. It smells like sunshine on skin and crisp air. I don't know HOW to describe that but it is just a skin scent that I finally like.. I usually think musk and other you but better typa scents like Glosser You, Another 13, Not a Perfume etc  smell nasty like I feel like I have to hold my breath around them they're too sharp for me. Soleil Neige just smells like skin but not dirty or sharp or too synthetic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2358214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2358214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323903" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323903" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rylai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67827.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="rylai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mizensir/Poudre-d-Or-48660.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48660.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Poudre d'Or"title="Poudre d'Or"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323903ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323903" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827">rylai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 10:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Because of my love for the Soleil Blanc, I decided to try the snow (neige) one. I don't like it at all. It's like putting a bitter lemon on your wrist under a watch with a metal band, then taking the watch off and smelling your wrist. A bitter and metallic thing like that turned out to be quite strong, the scents you love are not permanent, but this is permanent. I washed it well and it still smelled. The last scent left is a bitter creamy thing, the creaminess was the only thing I liked about it, the rest is horrible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2323903"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2323903#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2319049" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kittenpawz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1784272"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1784272.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kittenpawz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juicy-Couture/Viva-La-Juicy-Sucre-42053.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42053.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viva La Juicy Sucre"title="Viva La Juicy Sucre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2319049ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2319049" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1784272">kittenpawz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 14:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had a strange experience with Soleil Neige because the scent isn't outright offensive yet my every attempt to wear it ends with me thinking I don't want to smell it, especially not on myself. It opens with a blast of designer typical candied citrus, more lemon-like than bergamot. The first time I tried it was in an unusually hot August and back then past the citruses it smelled cologney and animalic; I just couldn't bear it and rushed to wash it off after about thirty minutes. The second time was in the loveliest September, it smelled like harsh citruses and a tad cleaner but still very potent musk. Third time's not exactly the charm either. Although now I find it sweeter and prettily feminine with even softer musk and gently sweet vanilla, something doesn't sit right with me anyway and I still remember very well the somewhat indolic white flowers, unpleasant musk and way too harsh citruses from my first two attempts. I am also inclined to agree with Patr70's review below. It is soapy like a $0.99 scented bar soap from a motel and at times comes off as a cleaning product too. During the final stage, before it evaporates completely, it smells of purer, almost crystalline, musk commonly used in women's designer fragrances. <br />
<br />
Very mass market run-of-the-mill type of scent that follows the familiar pattern of strong citric opening, stinky white flowers at heart and questionable musk in the base with vanilla and a masculine accord to seal the deal. Unisex as in neutered and uninspired. Neither here nor there. To add salt to the wound, it becomes a skin scent within an hour. 🤨 Niche brands need a reality check.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2319049"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2319049#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2316333" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316333" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="icerise"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1001214.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="icerise" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316333ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316333" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214">icerise</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 07:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It sweet, powdery, clean and has an ice cold energy about it.  Like you know when you chew gum?  It doesn’t smell like mint, but it has a cooling effect about it.  When I wear it, I feel very rich and professional, but not boss lady vibes.  Just understated and put together.  To me it’s leaning more feminine, but if a guy wore it, I would do a double take and smile from ear to ear.  It’s really beautiful in the summer.  I tried it the other day, and since it’s fall now, it seems off…like you know after you spit out your gum, or after brushing your teeth, and you drink water?  It feels too cold in cold weather, but it’s like a spray-on air conditioner in the summer. <br />
<br />
For more context, my collection is approaching 100, and I love typically feminine-leaning scents and gourmands (although not too much sweetness).  While this is more unisex, it’s one of the ones I crave and easily reach for.  One of my favourites too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2316333"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2316333#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308134" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jarroditshallbe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jarroditshallbe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308134ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308134" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090287">jarroditshallbe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-07">10/07/24 14:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A Swiss mountain spa's hot shower. Unknowable luxurious retreat. The amenities are impossible for the altitude, but somehow, they remain fresh and crisp; The food, the flowers, the icy air. It has penetrated your bones, and turned you into your own steam rock. <br />
<br />
The water from the shower is plenty hot, and the ambient cold of your marble room chills it halfway down your body leaving chill bumps that feel more electric than uncomfortable. <br />
<br />
The robes sit heating on the rack glow with benzoin, and the steam infuses them with a milky rose. Putting it on is a clothed lotion for the soul.<br />
<br />
You pick the little white flowers from the copper twinged vase and put them around the room and on your person. Tucker in robe pockets and carefully placed in your hair.  It feels like the ice is breaking on your stay and you notice the locals at the spa have a more liberal approach to nudity. Nude beaches were never your thing. But nude mountains.... The chill bumps come back. <br />
<br />
@jarrod_cuthrell on IG</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2308134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2308134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303734" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303734" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jkiins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2268689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2268689.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jkiins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303734ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303734" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2268689">Jkiins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I recently bought a travel set with Soleil Blanc, Soleil Neige, and Soeil De feu. Soleil Neige was my second favorite of the three. On my skin I mostly pick up the orange blossom and mandarin notes. The vanilla and benzoin are still there though making this a nice balance between freshness and warmth. Overall very sophisticated and inoffensive scent. My only complaint is that unfortunately on my skin it only lasts about two hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2303734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2303734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301335" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301335" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CChanel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1206247"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1206247.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CChanel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301335ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301335" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1206247">CChanel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 10:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice scent, more feminine leaning.  The name of perfume represents the scent very well - nostalgic, clean, powdery floral.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2301335"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2301335#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2292454" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eelss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/63218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.63218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eelss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2292454ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2292454" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/63218">eelss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 08:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of my perfumes which I said ‘something smells good here’ then ended up buying :) First I tested upon seller's advice at duty free shop, but I wasn’t too impressed. Later that day while I was driving, there was a good smell that I couldn't find at first. Then I discovered the scent was coming from my arm where I sprayed Soleil Neige. It developed very nicely on my skin. I love all the notes in this, especially orange blossom, also I assume labdanum and carrot seeds make this perfume more unique. This has a good lasting power with clean, sweet and mixed white flower smell on my skin. It is cold and warm at the same time. I picture a man and woman in white outfits, wearing Soleil Neige. Among all Tom Ford’s perfumes I’ve tried, this is the best. Price is high but this is worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2292454"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2292454#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278523" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278523" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gemsense"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1157351"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1157351.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gemsense" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nest/Madagascar-Vanilla-Perfume-Oil-66886.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66886.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Madagascar Vanilla Perfume Oil"title="Madagascar Vanilla Perfume Oil"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278523ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278523" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1157351">Gemsense</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 17:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow I didn’t expect to be wowed by a Tom ford perfume! This house usually doesn’t work with my chemistry ⚛️ the way this has crystallized with my skin is gorgeous! It’s like sparkling snow crystals shimmering in the sun! ⛅️ I’m really surprised by this for real!  <br />
     It’s so generic at first and plain- the notes don’t mesh or blend and smell off but then as it settles this waft of beauty envelops my senses and it’s like what’s that gorgeous smell? It’s coming from my wrists!  It’s very slightly coconut but just enough to make this solar in the snow.❄️ up close it’s astringent with a bread smell but wafts of it is beautiful ❤️❄️❄️❄️. This is a stunner!<br />
   Btw when it settles it’s candy like but not in an overly sweet artificial way more subtly sweet. Clean floral sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2278523"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2278523#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2262569" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blondescent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1203269"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1203269.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blondescent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2262569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2262569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1203269">blondescent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 09:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely beautiful perfume! Fresh but also warming and cozy. After testing I had to buy it. Projects a lot at first but then becomes more of a skin scent. After I’ve worn it a while I’ve become a bit nose blind to the dry down unfortunately. Way overpriced but I made an exception on this one… :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2262569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2262569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251883" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But.. the Sillage is beautiful. Strange Dichotomy 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2251883"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2251883#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242465" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242465" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sakecat22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1563044"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1563044.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sakecat22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Electimuss/Cupid-s-Kiss-90197.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90197.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cupid's Kiss"title="Cupid's Kiss"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242465ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242465" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1563044">sakecat22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 03:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soleil Neige on my skin reads like a sweet jasmine/orange blossom floral that fades down into a lovely resinous vanilla.<br />
However, that perfume is crammed into a package of carrot seeds - including the mustiness of the seeds and the paper envelope of a seed pack.  That vibe lasts throughout the wear on me.<br />
<br />
That seed pack smell makes Soleil Neige different. <br />
The accord reminds me of some of the more gothic small indie oils I own.<br />
I'm not sure I like it on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2242465"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2242465#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233435" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233435" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="harperpeshhe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1322710"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1322710.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="harperpeshhe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/CoSTUME-NATIONAL/So-Nude-15377.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15377.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="So Nude"title="So Nude"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233435ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233435" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1322710">harperpeshhe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 02:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So, waaay back in the day in my late teens I used to wear and love Coty Exclamation, Revlon Fire &amp; Ice and Fire &amp; Ice Cool. Imagine my surprise when I first tested Soleil Neige and I was transported back to the fun of my late teens. On first spray this has a similar vibe (to my memory at least) to Fire &amp; Ice with a tinge of  powder or musk. On drydown though it resembles more Fire &amp; Ice Cool.<br />
Although it’s cool and crisp with gentle florals it has great lasting power on my skin. 8 hours so far and still going strong.  Big love for all seasons and occasions and leans very feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2233435"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2233435#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222634" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="QueOndaGuera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1827142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1827142.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="QueOndaGuera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Sweetly-Known-64644.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64644.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweetly Known"title="Sweetly Known"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222634ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222634" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1827142">QueOndaGuera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 14:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unique little blend that is pretty and peaceful, not “in your face” making its presence known. I really enjoy the carrot seed note with the florals, balanced out by the ambery base notes. To me it smells a little like sunscreen (in a good way), like a cool cloudy beach day where the water is cold and you’re in a hoodie and relaxing on the sand. I sprayed my sample all over but didn’t get much sillage, longevity was just about 4 hours so not “amazing”. Still enjoy this fragrance regardless</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2222634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2222634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219623" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219623" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jimmy &quot;the Sniff&quot;"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191907"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2191907.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jimmy &quot;the Sniff&quot;" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219623ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219623" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191907">Jimmy &quot;the Sniff&quot;</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 18:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one snuck up on me! When freshly-sprayed, it's pleasant but not out-of-this-world, but I love the way the citrusy white flower scent develops into a warm vanilla-resin without losing the overall fresh, bright effect. It makes me feel awake and alert, and almost has a little sunscreen-y note in a good way. I would love to wear this on a fun, busy day out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2219623"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2219623#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213047" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2213047" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tooturntswizz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473903"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1473903.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tooturntswizz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2213047ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2213047" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473903">Tooturntswizz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-09">07/09/24 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soleil Neige - This aptly named fragrance is truly divine. It embodies a crisp, white freshness, evoking the pristine air of snowcapped mountains.<br />
<br />
The carrot seeds in the opening make this fragrance unique, blending perfectly with bergamot for a burst of freshness.<br />
<br />
The heart of the fragrance showcases white florals and jasmine, delivering a sweet essence that is expertly tempered by vanilla. Although the rose is not prominently detectable, it may be subtly woven into the background.<br />
<br />
Resins in the base provide a gentle, sun-kissed warmth.<br />
<br />
Overall, the projection and sillage of Soleil Neige are exceptional.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2213047"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2213047#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211755" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This fragrance is a good daily wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2211755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2211755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205080" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205080" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Delicately_unapologetic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2182392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Delicately_unapologetic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Vodka-on-the-Rocks-23899.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23899.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vodka on the Rocks"title="Vodka on the Rocks"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205080ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205080" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182392">Delicately_unapologetic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 14:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Criminally underrated.<br />
It's a shame that Soleil Blanc overshadows this masterpiece.<br />
I'll describe the scent with one word, Divine.<br />
Perfect for all year.<br />
True unisex.<br />
<br />
• Scent: 10/10<br />
• Performance: 7/10 <br />
   (I would put 6/10 but 6-8 hours are decent for a "floral freshie", but if you spray it on clothes, it's eternal)<br />
<br />
• Would I recommend you to buy it?<br />
<br />
If I'm being brutally honest, when I bought it I got it off a trusted retailer while it had a 20% discount, the price was around 190/200€ for 50ml.<br />
But since Estee Lauder bought TF, the prices right now are even crazier (a guy that works there told me the brand raised the price 3 times in the current year) from what they used to be, in my country they're asking 270€ price tag for 50ml.<br />
Even though this is one of my top three, I wouldn't pay 270€ for a designer-niche 50ml.<br />
<br />
Can't wait to get you back in my hands Neige. 🤍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2205080"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2205080#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2201623" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I don't get the hype over Soleil Blanc at all but I really dig this one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2201623"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2201623#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185747" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Fixação péssima que não faz jus ao Tom Ford, uma pena. Bem feminino, me sinto num vestido de linho numa tarde de primavera no Sol da Toscana, delicioso, chique, alta classe. Mas precisa ser reaplicado e pode dar enxaqueca nas primeiras horas.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2185747"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2185747#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2157606" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108569">Kencalsuda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-16">05/16/24 01:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I accidentally tried this on me when i sprayed dior addict earlier (about 16 hours and yes addict lasts forever), they combined amazing. align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2134649"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2134649#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124505" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2124505" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CiCiGourmand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1422271"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1422271.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CiCiGourmand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bob-Mackie/Mackie-5061.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5061.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mackie"title="Mackie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2124505ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2124505" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1422271">CiCiGourmand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-14">04/14/24 08:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the early 2000's maybe 2005?; there was a Shalimar flanker called Shalimar Light. To my nose the opening of Soleil Neige reminds me of that fragrance. It starts to dry down a little differently but I still get the light and powdery citric vibes that SL had. If Soleil Neige were more linear and stayed like the opening then I would consider a full bottle. It's just not amazing enough to me to spend that Tom Ford price tag.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2124505"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2124505#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123058" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="natk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632818"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1632818.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="natk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123058ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123058" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632818">natk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-12">04/12/24 19:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first 15-20 minutes are amazing. I love it. Then it quickly turns into something sweet -ish with a dash of florals and labdanum, very generic dry down similar to hundreds and hundreds of other perfumes. Does not project after 20 minutes but the dry down lasts a couple of hours (if you smell where you sprayed it) which is probably decent for a TF fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2123058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2123058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2121149" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2121149" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ground hound"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1589008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ground hound" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Olfactive-Studio/Iris-Shot-54869.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54869.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Shot"title="Iris Shot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2121149ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2121149" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589008">Ground hound</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-11">04/11/24 03:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A surprisingly good combination. Fresh and powdery at the same time.<br />
Long lasting, refreshing and unusual in a good way but that's very individual, I can see how this mix can be disliked. My top 5 of all TFs.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2121149"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2121149#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106383" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106383" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Anamandy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174774"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1174774.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Anamandy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Salvatore-Ferragamo/Viola-Essenziale-51864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viola Essenziale"title="Viola Essenziale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106383ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106383" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174774">Anamandy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 19:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely florals with a hefty dose of benzoin, and a delicious vanilla labdanum dry down. I have the body oil and I am amazed that this is actually projecting considering that rarely happens even with some of Ford's other perfumes in the Soleil line. Certainly not Soleil Blanc. That is a complete washout on me after only a little while of wear. This body oil is so much stronger and longer lasting than that. I've had it on several hours now after taking a shower, and it is still going strong.  I'm toying with the idea of getting a bottle of the perfume, but since this is ringing all the bells for me, I don't know how much better that would be than this - if at all. Besides, the thought of shelling out $200 bucks for something that might not perform any better than this $20 buy is not very appealing. So, while I absolutely love this, I'll have to think on that some more. But as of right now, I am leaning against it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2106383"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2106383#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106381" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Barely detectible vanilla. I do not see the appeal and canceled my order after trying it on paper in John Lewis.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2080919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2080919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
