padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1948850">user2988</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-25">02/25/24 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells more feminine and floral close to the skin which im not the biggest fan of but in the air and more into the dry down i get more of a creamy vanilla smell and some musk which is more unisex and very enjoyable, the florals seem to quiet down a bit . i enjoy how this is both very summery and wintery at the same time. <br />
<br />
when i imagine the type of person this smells like, i think football player, b-list actor, male figure skater, gay uncle, french supermodel and rich grandma <br />
<br />
performance i think should be better for the price</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2073793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2073793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2072101" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2072101" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="East River Pearl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560862"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1560862.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="East River Pearl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2072101ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2072101" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560862">East River Pearl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-23">02/23/24 19:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was so close to loving this but I think the rose ruins it for me. The white florals and the bergamot are lovely and bright and feminine, and the carrot seed adds a clean, freshness, but the rose turns it powdery and diaper like. If you like powdery rose scents you might not mind this, but for me it's disqualifying. Such a shame because I really adore everything else about the scent. Its good qualities remind me of Montblanc's Signature.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2072101"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2072101#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070540" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2070540" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cheleine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349744"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1349744.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cheleine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Duelle-Eau-de-Toilette-9241.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9241.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"title="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2070540ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2070540" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349744">cheleine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-22">02/22/24 11:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I started nodding instantly when I smelled this.<br />
There’s something in here that makes you keep coming back to your wrist to explore it even more. It’s very interesting. I will agree that it smells cold like  snowfall but not in an unapproachable kind of way. <br />
It feels fresh and enchanting like a winter fairy. <br />
It’s basically white florals and carrot seeds but the result is very beautiful, ethereal and well blended.<br />
Definitely worth a try.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2070540"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2070540#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064840" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dandadadan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1856093"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dandadadan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064840ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064840" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1856093">Dandadadan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-17">02/17/24 01:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just fine, nothing special.<br />
If you like this scent profile try Nirmal by laboratorio olfattivo. Same vibes much cheaper</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2064840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2064840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064481" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064481" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The lamb family"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417617"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1417617.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="The lamb family" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064481ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064481" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417617">The lamb family</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-16">02/16/24 14:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Here’s the thing I don’t like mugler alien and I don’t like black orchid or grand soir or soleil blanc or angels share or Tobacco Vanille I have or had all of those fragrances but let me to tell you I absolutely love Soleil Neige Tom Ford it’s very light it’s not beast mode but it doesn’t have lasting power that’s my only complaint for 300+ I expect my fragrance to last over an hour and not become a skin scent and not to smell like fragrances I already own it remind me of Amouage honour woman &amp; Portrayal mixed together it’s like they copied paste this fragrance it’s not unique enough for the price tag! But I do enjoy this scent all I get is pink bubble gum and yellow flowers and slightly powdered  if that makes sense it’s light weight but I do like it and I love the bottle and packaging. And all the fragrances I mentioned above were either to masculine or too loud but soleil blanc is growing on me I must say it wasn’t a love a fussy sniff.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1409640">nickinicole</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-13">02/13/24 14:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Light and fresh. It's love at first sniff!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2061265"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2061265#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2055373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2055373" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glyceryl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1164868.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glyceryl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Paradoxe-Virtual-Flower-95006.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95006.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Paradoxe Virtual Flower"title="Prada Paradoxe Virtual Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2055373ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2055373" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164868">Glyceryl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-07">02/07/24 17:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have this in the shimmering body oil, and I like the scent so much more than I thought I would. <br />
<br />
It smells clean and beachy to me. Slightly like a luxury sunscreen. A little herbal, a little citrus, a little sweet. Has a soft layer of coziness to it that makes me think of freshly laundered crisp white sheets.<br />
<br />
When I smell this I think of a sunny day at the beach, laying on a white lounge chair and drinking an ice cold lemonade. It’s lovely and I want to now buy the actual perfume to layer over the body oil.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2055373"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2055373#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2036159" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Romantic1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896031"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1896031.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Romantic1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2036159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2036159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896031">Romantic1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-19">01/19/24 21:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Modern Vanilla chapstick with a classic kiss on bight sunny snowy day… <br />
<br />
love this fragrance, ok so here me out,  something about this fragrance reminds me of Chanel No 5, they are completely different, not saying they smell the same but kinda act similar, imo I feel Soliel Neige is a modern deconstructed version of Chanel No. 5,  here are some similarities, Chanel No 5, was inspired by the smell of snow. and from the name Soliel Neige in French mean sun-snow <br />
Here are the similarities between the 2 based on my opinion; florals, aldehydes,musk, vanilla, amber, animalics.<br />
<br />
The Top note, carrot seeds in Soleil Neige mimics the animalic notes present in the dry down of Chanel <br />
No.5 of civet and musk. <br />
<br />
The white flowers in Soleil Neige mimics aldehyde notes but a more modern version of aldehyde. Chanel No.5 has classic aldehyde notes.  <br />
<br />
They both have vanilla,  powdery <br />
notes with citrus and jasmine,  there are similarities, so in my opinion this feels like a modern deconstructed Chanel No 5 inspiration and I love it. <br />
If you are looking for something modern but with a classic story this is your fragrance. Not a blind buy definitely test before you buy, definitely see this being used as a signature fragrance mixes with your body chemistry and becomes your individual unique scent,  it may or may not work for everyone. Smells beautiful however I wish it lasted longer, gives 4 hrs and fizzles down silliage is moderate and can improve, performs better in cooler weather with longevity and projection. I do love this fragrance but unfortunately had to take a break from it because an ex friend I knew started to wear this way after me and unfortunately on her it reeked of salty octopus, on me fortunately it smells divine so I will take a break from it and give myself time to heal from octopus smelling ex-friend encounter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2036159"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2036159#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009069" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="G0rebloom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1933935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="G0rebloom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Emerald-Thyme-Cologne-90256.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90256.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emerald Thyme Cologne"title="Emerald Thyme Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); Something about the carrot seed really does it for me,, it's chilly but herbal but like a bleached incense. Sprayed in the air it's alright and on clothes it's generic but on my skin it is so romantic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2009069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2009069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2004723" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2004723" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="saho93"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1630728"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1630728.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="saho93" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2004723ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2004723" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1630728">saho93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-18">12/18/23 17:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was hoping that this would make me think of a sunny, brilliant day after 2 feet of snow, though I am not sure what that would smell like. But this doesn’t evoke snow. I think it’s too balmy, spiced, and dense than ethereal. <br />
<br />
I think it’s competently formulated; just not my preferred scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2004723"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2004723#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2004482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2004482" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TonyFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479996"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1479996.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TonyFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2004482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2004482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479996">TonyFragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-18">12/18/23 12:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very unoriginal and short lasting non descript scent. A rare TF miss!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2004482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2004482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2000356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439309">Deulseobs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-13">12/13/23 12:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this, but this personally reminds me of my childhood piano teacher's house, haha. Warm but also... not exactly what I want to smell like. Love the carrot seeds note though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="2000356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=2000356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1998597" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1998597" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Katelynl88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1367919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Katelynl88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1998597ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1998597" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1367919">Katelynl88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-11">12/11/23 12:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is it really just me ?  This smells very similar to black opium.  When I first sprayed , I thought it reminded me of something,  secret genius crossed my mind ,  then maybe mom Paris ,  then it dries down and it hit me , it smells almost like black opium mixed with Bon Bon . I like it .  Not enough to buy the real one but I’ll give the oakcha version a try . I’ve been happy with their dupes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1998597"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1998597#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995546" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KaitM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KaitM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Twilly-d-Hermes-46145.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46145.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Twilly d’Hermès"title="Twilly d’Hermès"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995546ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995546" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414463">KaitM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 21:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hoped to love this because it has a lot of notes that agree with me, but it’s somehow generic on the whole. Yes, a little like citronella annd sunscreen—and I like the smell of those—but it’s also like something you’d spray on sheets. That said I do still like it and the base notes linger forever if you DO happen to get it on blankets, or more likely, clothes. Imo, not worth the price tag nor as good as other TF fragrances. Just different enough from standard vanilla frags that the vanilla girls will go gaga and think it’s super unique though.<br />
<br />
ETA: I’m using the rest of my sample as a linen spray and it’s great for that! Smells expensive (cuz it is lol).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1995546"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1995546#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1993740" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1993740" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="girldeadbug"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238637"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1238637.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="girldeadbug" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kyse-Perfumes/Gateau-de-Carnavale-53315.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53315.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gateau de Carnavale"title="Gateau de Carnavale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1993740ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1993740" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238637">girldeadbug</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 02:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So surprised that I love this as much as I do, and my male partner actually likes it too! He hates florals, especially white florals, but they must be blended to perfection here. For him, he smells snow/coldness, and “fancy spray paint”. Not really sure what that means since I have very minimal experience with fancy spray paint. I didn’t ask him to elaborate, sorry. 😅 For me, this is a warm, fuzzy, cozy (floral) scent perfect for winter days with sunshine. But it shines regardless, as long as it’s cold. I think because of the massive bouquet, wearing it in cold weather tones it down a lot. It’s not overbearing or stuffy like, for example, Prada Paradox (the OG.. the Intense flanker on the other hand is gorgeous). I seriously love to spritz a little of this indoors on myself when I’m feeling chilly and want a boost of happiness and comfort. It’s like your oldest oversized creamy off-white 100% cashmere cardigan that you can’t bare to get rid of year after year because every winter you find yourself cocooning in it, trends be damned. This isn’t like any other floral I’ve tried. And I have come to love most of them. You would swear it was blended with amber. I suppose it’s just the base notes coming up early doing their thang! But as usual with Tom Ford, longevity is just not there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1993740"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1993740#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1966450" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1966450" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NickColaTesla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872520"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="NickColaTesla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1966450ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1966450" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872520">NickColaTesla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-01">11/01/23 21:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sillage is actually really good! The performance isn't bad for the first 3-4 hours, either; the bad reviews say it's poor, BUT that's ONLY after the 4th hour. For some reason, once that 4th hour hits, the fragrance vanishes in the span of 30 minutes... But you'll be smelling AMAZING until then!<br />
<br />
Not much to say that hasn't already been said: Bergamot opening with a Vanilla dry down, I think this fragrance is an introvert's dream (I'm even a man wearing it). It doesn't scream loudly, it doesn't feel out of place, and it works year round. It's something that can be very intimate and you can smell when you're close to someone like leaning over them or having a 1 on 1 conversation. It's light, floral, and not gooey. <br />
<br />
I would also LOVE to see a woman wearing this!<br />
<br />
Not all fragrances are meant to be beastmode, light up a room, announce themselves when they walk in. This definitely has a personality attached to it in that regard!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1966450"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1966450#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1958833" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1958833" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ecwestb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ecwestb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mizensir/Tres-Chere-45116.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45116.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tres Chere"title="Tres Chere"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1958833ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1958833" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571353">ecwestb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-23">10/23/23 06:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm very surprised at the lasting power of this fragrance, but also happy for it since it turns out I don't like it very much. It is a warm, happy, feminine fragrance, but It's more powdery than I was expecting and ends up smelling a little too mature for me. The dry down is very nice, though, a sweet vanilla.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1958833"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1958833#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1948376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1948376" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Phoenix Cat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1860536.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Phoenix Cat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29083.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A La Rose"title="A La Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1948376ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1948376" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860536">Phoenix Cat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-10">10/10/23 06:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fluffy, floral marshmallow with a Bergamot opening. Smells soft, warm and feminine. <br />
<br />
Dry down is powdery, sweet vanilla and bright florals with very short longevity (2-3hrs placed on wrist).<br />
<br />
I am not a fan or orange blossoms because it gives me headaches, however, this one is so well blended, I didn't mind.<br />
<br />
It was love at first whiff, but longevity and sillage is lacking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1948376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1948376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946673" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1946673" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sharp"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712962"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1712962.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sharp" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1946673ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1946673" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712962">Sharp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 17:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It opens so pretty, in a burst of white flowers! But then it becomes very faint -- only the vanilla remains, and it's not exciting enough -- and I have to reapply. Definitely this is a summer/spring perfume. Leans feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1946673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1946673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1317582">Heavenly Heather</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 13:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Somehow these notes of white florals and carrots seeds combined give me the impression of a snow fall late in spring. Everything is covered in snow but the sun’s out and it starts to melt where there are flowers and green grass underneath. As the fragrance dries down it starts to warm up a bit and I get a beautiful vanilla with some powdery notes. Really nice fragrance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1946521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1946521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1943407" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1943407" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="churinl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/731667"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.731667.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="churinl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Samsara-Extrait-25318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Samsara Extrait"title="Samsara Extrait"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1943407ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1943407" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/731667">churinl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-03">10/03/23 13:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is just stunning! I received a travel sized decant from by subscription service and couldn't be happier, except for knowing I'm going to need to purchase a full bottle. It starts out with a fuzzy, somewhat powdery top, with the benzoin and white floral blend playing well together. The benzoin cuts through any potentially overly heady effects from the white flowers, while along with the vanilla, creates a bit of a creamy effect.<br />
Since I just received it, these are my first impressions. However, I am 99% certain a full bottle is in my future. Longevity and sillage are both moderate, and I think these leans heavily to the feminine side, though that's for each individual to decide. I love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1943407"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1943407#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1942046" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I know there’s no coconut in this but my nose picks up something tropical in this perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1928584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1928584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923172" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923172" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Msc1977"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293601"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293601.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Msc1977" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Colonia-Leather-Eau-de-Cologne-Concentree-25349.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25349.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée"title="Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923172ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923172" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293601">Msc1977</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-08">09/08/23 17:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's the bergamot and carrot seed, together they make almost a fizzy "coldness" accord.<br />
That with heavy dose of benzyl salicylate (sunscreen smell) and lily of the valley raw materials, and jasmine raw materials with a hint of rose, mainly citronellol, and a touch of damascenone total to give it a slight jammy feel. Loads of hedione and iso E super, ambroxan, some wood materials (I'm thinking cedar) some ionones, benzoin, labdanum, vanillin, touch of ethyl Maltol and some  aldehyde c-14 and c-18 with a lot of white musks. <br />
This is a wonderful scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1923172"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1923172#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1910939" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1910939" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="V_rose29"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="V_rose29" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1910939ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1910939" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337003">V_rose29</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-25">08/25/23 02:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this fragrance so much it’s crisp it’s clean and very well blended the dry down is beautiful I don’t have really anything like this it’s like a cold scent no warmth to it.<br />
What really let’s this fragrance down is the longevity and performance it just isn’t there it lasts probably 1-2 hours on my skin over sprayed along with being sprayed lots on my clothes, last probably 3/4 hours on my clothes then completely just disappears you can no longer smell it. I do everything to make it last but it just doesn’t. I have two 10ml travels of this and a 50ml bottle, when I did wear it I would bring the travel out With me and top it up but honestly I don’t like todo that much I like to be able to spray on my fragrance and not have to worry about topping it up every 2 hrs i really do like it but it’s just not worth the retail price I’m thinking to sell my bottles I have because I do not use it anymore due to the lack of longevity</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1891142" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enikom2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1804744"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enikom2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1891142ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1891142" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1804744">Enikom2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 11:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a lovely scent! I could sniff this all day. It smells like creamy, sunny, tropical white flowers on freshly showered skin. The only problem i have is longevity. It does linger on you all day but very softly, barely noticeable after a few hours. It works better in a cool, air conditioned room, so i will try it in winter. The scent is very summery but the performance is better in colder weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1891142"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1891142#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1891064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490383">dananic4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 09:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I went to a Tom Ford counter to smell Soleil Blanc, since that's all the rage and highly recommended for summer. I did like that one, but the associate suggested I also try Soleil Neige which I'd never even heard of. I was blown away, wow this is a beautiful fragrance! I much preferred it over Soleil Blanc, this is more of a fresh floral scent which I am learning I gravitate towards. Soleil Blanc would be fun to wear on vacation, but I think Soleil Neige would be a fantastic scent to wear at any time, regardless of the season.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1833179" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iszzieanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iszzieanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1833179ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1833179" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905">iszzieanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-14">05/14/23 19:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Crisp, clean and cool. This has a nod to the original Soleil Blanc, but it is a cleaner, more “cool-toned/blue light” version of SB. A sparkling interpretation. There’s quite an off-putting note in this for me. Not sure what it is. Not loving it. But I love the cold interpretation of snow with warmth of benzoin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1833179"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1833179#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1819266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1819266" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AnlisaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/491"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.491.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AnlisaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boucheron/Ambre-D-Alexandrie-44718.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44718.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre D'Alexandrie"title="Ambre D'Alexandrie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1819266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1819266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/491">AnlisaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-27">04/27/23 14:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don’t find TF fragrances worth the money at all. I did buy this and I do love it! TF does make amazing scents, it is so unfortunate that they don’t last….😣. Ok, so this is an amazing fragrance otherwise, I always want to get rid of it but keep coming back to this woody fun summer fragrance. Everyone can wear this it’s amazing and definitely a fragrance to wear in the summer during the evenings at dinner or at an event! I wore this at the pool last summer and it worked great! the carrot seeds and benzoin make this wonderful and very unisex. It’s not the usual summer coconut which do appreciate. Highly recommended but TF PLEASE make them last longer. 9/10 only because of the longevity!!! Otherwise a 20/10!!!! That’s how good it is!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1819266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1819266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1812706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1253499">L8eenL8</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-19">04/19/23 11:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the quintessential young rich heiress, old money perfume. One sniff and I suddenly believe my trust fund is there to catch me when I fall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1812706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1812706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1807167" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1807167" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ambervxyjul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598318"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1598318.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ambervxyjul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1807167ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1807167" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598318">ambervxyjul</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-12">04/12/23 13:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have the shimmer body oil version of this so I’m not sure if it differs from the actual perfume but I’m guessing they’re the same scent regardless. I was so worried when I heard the citrus notes and lime references because I’m very anti air freshener smell on my body. I don’t like acidic citrus in my perfume but oh my gosh how lovely is this! In the opening yes you get a lime bitterness but that fades quickly after 5 minutes. It turns into the most beautiful and sweet jasmine scent with hints of vanilla. It reminds me of a key lime pie. So good! I prefer this definitely over the gold shimmer spray that everyone’s goes crazy for. Hidden gem!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1807167"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1807167#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1803291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179441">sarahherbs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-07">04/07/23 17:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminds me so much of a childhood memory and lots of different perfumes but not a specific memory or perfume! It’s almost a combination of lots of perfumes from the 90s. The first perfume I had as a child was Sand &amp; Sables by Coty and my 4th grade teacher wore Jessica McClintock perfume. Both are light white florals, if you take that and mix it with banana boat sunscreen and Burberry Brit I get this perfume. It’s light and clean and inoffensive. I wear this just for me just to have the memory profile but I’m sure others would think of it as a nice floral scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1803291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1803291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1799247" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
