This shouldn’t happen with a price tag this large.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1799247"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1799247#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1792733" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1792733" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DrRosie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1205841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1205841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DrRosie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clive-Christian/Blonde-Amber-73595.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73595.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blonde Amber"title="Blonde Amber"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1792733ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1792733" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1205841">DrRosie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-25">03/25/23 20:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I overlooked this fragrance for several years because I did not like Soleil Blanc and thought they would be similar. I went to the store and the SA asked me to test it, OMG what a stunner this beauty is! I am so glad it is part of my collection now. For Easter I paired this with Coco Mademoiselle Body Oil and It was excellent. On Monday after Easter, I went to the TF counter and tied it with the oil spray for the perfume, OMG-Fudge! You can guess the rest. While I stood by the counter just to chat fragrance with the SA, 4 different women passed by and complimented on how something smelled great. I told them it was the the fragrance and the oil combo, well, two of them wanted it right away. Oh yeah, the oil is now part of my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1792733"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1792733#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1791054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1791054" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="whoaboy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/989906"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.989906.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="whoaboy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Memoir-Woman-10146.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10146.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Memoir Woman"title="Memoir Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1791054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1791054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/989906">whoaboy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-23">03/23/23 16:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On paper this smelled nice, like an orange-tinged cognac or perhaps Cointreau. However, on the skin, I can't get away from a synthetic cloud that just won't quit. When I put my nose to my wrist, I can sense the benzoin/orange blossom combo, but otherwise, it's as if someone sprayed bug or hairspray on my orange creamsicle. The artificial was so overwhelming that I had to shower it off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1791054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1791054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1784144" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1784144" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tony Shades"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029609"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1029609.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tony Shades" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Moustache-Original-1949-52351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Moustache Original 1949"title="Moustache Original 1949"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1784144ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1784144" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029609">Tony Shades</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-15">03/15/23 11:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very smooth cozy elegant white floral with soft balsamic undertones. It's light and airy but has enough depth to work all year round. I would also wear it in the summer, not just in winter as the marketing suggests.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1784144"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1784144#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1784067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1784067" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="crltrck20"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259304"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="crltrck20" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angels' Share"title="Angels' Share"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1784067ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1784067" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259304">crltrck20</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-15">03/15/23 09:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is what I imagine Lilly Van der Woodsen to smell like. Clean, sensual, elegant. Understated yet refined. This is the exact opposite of BR540, a typical old money scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1784067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1784067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1765531" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1765531" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1765531ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1765531" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-21">02/21/23 10:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soleil Neige is, as @Suzysmellsgood below says, the winter counterpoint to the summery Soleil Blanc. Both are white floral scents centred on an amber base, but while SB is a bright, slightly odd take on a suntan lotion scent, SN is a powdery, dry white floral with a musky drydown. It is bright, sure, but more evocative of harsh winter sun, reflected off snow. It is a bit too thin and shampoo-like for my liking, but overall pretty decent.<br />
<br />
SN opens with Earl Grey-like bergamot, fresh and tart, joined quickly by the white floral accord that forms the heart of this scent. Clean, powdery jasmine is most evident to my nose, with some sweetness provided by orange blossom. Some thin, powdery rose follows, blending in well with the other notes that I don't mind the thinness too much. There is an earthiness from the beginning, balancing the sweet florals nicely. <br />
<br />
Powdery vanilla emerges in the base, complementing the musky amber accord that develops at the drydown stage. The florals become soapy, resembling expensive shampoo. It fades to a sweet, musky skin scent, soapy until final fade. Sillage and longevity are moderate. <br />
<br />
A pleasant, slightly unusual white floral that is aptly named, SN is bright, thin and powdery. A transeasonal everyday scent, it is wearable and versatile. A bit too soapy and wan for my liking, however. 3/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1765531"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1765531#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1758003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1390261">Mariyamokshina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-11">02/11/23 20:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one is a gourmand slightly burned caramel . It’s sweet without being overpowering , I get the jasmine and some vanilla . I like it but I’m not sure if I can wear it all day without being overwhelmed by it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1758003"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1758003#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1747990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My favorite out of the Soleil line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1747990"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1747990#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1739193" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1739193" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SuzySmellsGood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307326"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1307326.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SuzySmellsGood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chloe/Nomade-48434.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48434.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nomade"title="Nomade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1739193ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1739193" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307326">SuzySmellsGood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-20">01/20/23 16:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yet another Tom Ford that I just love.  The list is slowly growing.  I loved Soleil Blanc first- for the summer.  This, for me, is the wintertime counterpart.  I actually had to come here to look up the notes because I can't pick out one over another, this is blended so well.  To me, this is sexy, classy, lux shampoo.  But I don't mind dousing myself in it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1739193"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1739193#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1733176" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1732950" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SaraZigova"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SaraZigova" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1732950ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1732950" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360277">SaraZigova</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-13">01/13/23 06:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like high end cleaning products, but in the kinda good way</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1732950"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1732950#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1732687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1732687" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trishaaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1458062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trishaaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1732687ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1732687" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1458062">Trishaaa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-12">01/12/23 20:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I will admit that the first impression of this was more like soap. The dry down balanced out but it came across kind of dirtier (as ironic as that is). Could be the carrot seed note maybe? I do appreciate that I'm not getting an overload of florals here but it does become a skin scent very quick much like other private collection scents which is sad considering what you pay for. Personally not for me, but I do see the overall appeal in what this offers :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1732687"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1732687#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1732544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1732544" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BeefNoodle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1104657.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BeefNoodle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Philosophy/Amazing-Grace-Bergamot-64081.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64081.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amazing Grace Bergamot"title="Amazing Grace Bergamot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1732544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1732544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104657">BeefNoodle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-12">01/12/23 16:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The only private collection Soleil that doesn't smell like sunscreen or tanning products to me. The bergamot is well-restrained by the slight sweet veg of the carrot seed and white flowers. I get the rose more than the jasmine though. The most interesting parts of the fragrance only seem to last a couple hours, but I could still get a slight whiff of the amber/vanilla after 8 hours. Work-appropriate when applied judiciously. <br />
<br />
I like it. But that's it- I just like it. Don't love it, didn't blow me away enough to justify the full price. Might ask for it as a gift or seek out a good dupe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1732544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1732544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1722555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1722555" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tilapia_johnson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504382"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tilapia_johnson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1722555ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1722555" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504382">tilapia_johnson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-01">01/01/23 13:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you are like me and have grown tired of the coco-nutty omnipotence of Soleil Blanc, then I would definitely give this a try. Though it is marketed as the silver to SB's gold, Soleil Neige gives the feeling of bright white-gold. It smells like money, so fresh and potent. One cannot wear this without their hair done and an outfit to meet the scent, just as one wouldn't wear a wrinkled Zara blazer with Manolo Blahniks. It is mostly white blossoms and vanillic benzoin, with an opening of carrot seed for the can't-put-my-finger-on-it It Factor. 'Sun on the snow' is a great metaphor, but it could easily be worn year-round. Feminine and ageless, certainly bougie. Unlike most anything I've smelled.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1722555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1722555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1721559" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1721559" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alabama13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1481421"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1481421.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alabama13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1721559ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1721559" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1481421">Alabama13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-31">12/31/22 06:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I keep seeing people say it’s a summer fragrance but I highly disagree. This is for cooler weather. When the cool wind hit your clothes you get a blast of this scent and it’s like paradise. There are performance issues with this one in the summer but lasts longer in winter on me. Maybe because it has to work so hard in the summer🤷🏾♀️ Somehow My nose picks up leathery and suede notes. It’s very smooth and uplifting. How could you not love this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1721559"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1721559#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1721288" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1721288" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rosegold"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/985684"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.985684.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rosegold" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1721288ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1721288" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/985684">Rosegold</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-30">12/30/22 18:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Light and bright.  This genre isn’t my usual wheelhouse but I don’t think that I’ve smelled anything like this.  It opens with a zingy bergamot and clean neroli which gives it a sparkling feeling which is indeed reminiscent of a sunny snowy day (aldehydes aren’t listed but there’s definitely a “lifted” feeling that aldehydes often bring to a perfume).  It dries down to a pretty powdery vanilla/benzoin.  For me, this has a “daytime casual” feel and I prefer it in the winter as it goes too powdery in warmer weather.  I wear one to two sprays to the nape of my neck and it lasts all day even when it’s -30C!!  It feels like a simple perfume but I think that is part of its beauty.  As an added bonus, it plays nicely with other perfumes so can be used to brighten darker/heavier scents or can provide a nice base to some lighter scents.  This doesn’t seem to be as popular as some of the other PBs, which means a new bottle can be picked up relatively affordably on the grey market.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1721288"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1721288#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1717881" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1717881" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="raiza1990"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/865802"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.865802.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="raiza1990" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Katy-Perry/Katy-Perry-s-Mad-Love-39443.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39443.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Katy Perry's Mad Love"title="Katy Perry's Mad Love"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1717881ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1717881" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/865802">raiza1990</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-26">12/26/22 15:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice. Not overly sweet, relaxing. It’s pleasant and well done. It’s a bit airy and cold but not really snowy. Anyways, it’s elegant and sensual. Easy to like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1717881"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1717881#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1717584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1717584" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Feaded&iacute;a"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1397034"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1397034.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Feaded&iacute;a" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Flora-Salvaggia-66359.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66359.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Flora Salvaggia"title="Aqua Allegoria Flora Salvaggia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1717584ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1717584" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1397034">Feaded&iacute;a</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-26">12/26/22 06:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got Soleil Neige  as a gift recently. I know people here keep saying it's a summer fragrance, but I disagree. The white flowers come through for me, as well as the carrot seeds. The bergamot is a bit more muted. I wore it to a party at a ski resort, and everyone complimented me on the scent. Apparently it projects as clean and airy. I think it smells exactly like the Chihuahuan dessert after the rain, namely the Gobernadora bush right after heavy rainfall. I am in love and I think I've found my new signature scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1717584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1717584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1711445" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1711445" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Air of Grace"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385605"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1385605.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Air of Grace" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/A-La-Nuit-513.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.513.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A La Nuit"title="A La Nuit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1711445ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1711445" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385605">Air of Grace</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-17">12/17/22 13:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Ford’s perfumes are a miss with me . So many of the fragrances are so spicy .<br />
<br />
Even with the name - Soleil Blanc and Soleil Neige . It’s English Intrepretatuon evokes a brighter , sunnier , lighter fragrance but I feel his scents are so amberish which isn’t my preferred olfactory group and the prices are exhorbitant! <br />
<br />
I’m going to give up on this perfume house</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1711445"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1711445#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1706811" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1706811" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lucky notes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1585319"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1585319.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lucky notes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Petit-Matin-40817.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40817.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Petit Matin"title="Petit Matin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1706811ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1706811" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1585319">Lucky notes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-11">12/11/22 03:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A gorgeous summer smell of beautiful tanned skin. I'm white AF so I love this. If this had a touch of coconut, it would be perfect. Unique, special summer smell.<br />
<br />
Performance is not great. I have to spray heavily to project and top it up after a few hours.<br />
<br />
I am considering a FB...post Xmas sales perhaps...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1706811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1706811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1699262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1699262" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LEM922"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1275562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1275562.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LEM922" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1699262ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1699262" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1275562">LEM922</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-30">11/30/22 10:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So, I did it. I popped my Tom Ford cherry. And while I thought that Soleil Blanc would be the perfume to do it, alas… It is not. I've always wanted a Tom Ford perfume and to expand my collection, but for something so expensive, it was something that I wasn't comfortable with blind buying. And the only thing I had smelled, was Soleil Blanc. Please, don't for a second misunderstand me. Soleil Blanc is still one of the prettiest perfumes I've ever smelled. I love the coconut vibe, the sunscreen vibe, the vacation vibe. Those are some of my favorite types of scents, and Tom Ford just did it beautifully. However, when I walked in the store and saw that they had a Soleil Neige up for tester, I just wanted to try it out of curiosity. <br />
<br />
Oh. My. God. I have never smelled anything so beautiful in my life. I love white flowers, but this is just so much more than that. This smells like luxury embodied. It's light, but it projects. It's airy, but far from weak. I sprayed some on my wrist, and then when I left I just kept smelling myself in the car with my windows down. The wind was blowing the scent from my wrist up to my face, and it just smelled so divine. I'm not even really sure how to describe this… This perfume is so beautifully blended together, that it's really hard to distinguish just a single note. But oh my God this is wonderful. If this is what Tom Ford regularly has to offer, I just might have to expand my collection quickly. Although I must say, this is inoffensive and I've heard some of his other perfumes can be quite polarizing… But I've never scared of a challenge. This one staying with me, for a long long time…<br />
<br />
As for the price? I get it now. That's all that needs to be said.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1699262"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1699262#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1697183" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1697183" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Compositeur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407511"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407511.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Compositeur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1697183ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1697183" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407511">Compositeur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-27">11/27/22 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What does 'nose behind this fragrance is Givaudan' mean exactly? Why the secrecy?!<br />
<br />
Basically, this is bergamot and light amber. There is also musk in the base, and also a touch of Ambroxan (mercifully it is kept under control). It reminds me of so many other things. It starts off promising, but it takes a wrong turn. The citrus is gone and all is left is musk and ambroxan. At this stage I'm not getting any vanilla.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1697183"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1697183#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1688664" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1688664" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sniffathon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357164.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sniffathon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1688664ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1688664" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357164">Sniffathon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-15">11/15/22 01:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stronger on the indolic white flowers than your usual white flower fragrances, combined with the amber base brings this way down from fresh to warmer and darker.  This is lovely and really does celebrate the imagery of a bright winter sun on a snowy day. My favourite of the “soleil” range. Very intoxicating and I find myself coming in close of my skin to take a huge whiff very often.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1688664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1688664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1682676" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1682676" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heavyindustry"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541525"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1541525.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heavyindustry" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56737.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Soleil Neige"title="Soleil Neige"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1682676ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1682676" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541525">heavyindustry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-06">11/06/22 20:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful warm weather scent that is fast replacing my Venetian Bergamot as a daily wear. I'd call it the most 'sparkly' citrus of all TF fragrances, delivering a different feel to the Neroli Portofino range. I detect orange, orange blossoms, amber sweetness and musky soapiness. However, the scent is very unique and can't be easily described as individual notes. The carrot seed gives a mild anise scent that sets it apart from other feminine fragrances, making it unique in a crowded space. Has a lot more personality compared to Soleil Blanc, so Neige is my preferred scent. Longevity is around the 5-6 hour mark with soft projection. <br />
<br />
Layers very easily with many other scents, such as Oud Wood or the aforementioned Venetian Bergamot, by giving the paired scent top end sparkle and added sweetness towards the base. Layering also substantially improves the performance of Soleil Neige, possibly carrying it beyond the 8 hour mark.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1682676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1682676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1675973" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1675973" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="John Bob"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1597557"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="John Bob" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1675973ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1675973" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1597557">John Bob</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-28">10/28/22 05:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is something special. Its gentleness reminds me of a first kiss, soft snow, and lemon sorbet. It's peaceful. 9/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1675973"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1675973#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1670937" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1670937" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Amoperfumes783"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336433"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1336433.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Amoperfumes783" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Musc-Noir-Rose-For-Her-71596.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71596.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Noir Rose For Her"title="Musc Noir Rose For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1670937ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1670937" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336433">Amoperfumes783</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-21">10/21/22 04:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of my favorite TF fragrances, it’s so beautiful, feminine and clean. Went to Nordstrom and the associate handed me this one to smell…I think I fell in love at first sniff. I’ve never heard anyone talk about Soleil Neige why? In my personal opinion is better than Soleil Blanc. <br />
The associate then shared a combo: Soleil Neige and Ebene Fume…. WOW 🤯 No words! Beautiful! So so beautiful! <br />
All of this happened about 2 weeks ago, I kept the paper strips where she sprayed the perfumes and combo and put them next to my bed, just came back from a trip yesterday, the smell is still there! <br />
I will purchase them at some point for sure. <br />
100% recommend</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1670937"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1670937#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1659987" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1659987" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fragrancefanatica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1584039"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fragrancefanatica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1659987ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1659987" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1584039">fragrancefanatica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-06">10/06/22 00:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is sooo beautiful and is my absolute favorite. I'm obsessed with this private blend. It is very unique in that although the separate notes sometimes may resemble other fragrances, I have never smelled another fragrance with this particular blend of notes.  I was actually trying to find ones that were similar to add to my fragrance collection,  and could not find anything. I even went as far to purchase a dupe from a UK company who surprisingly were able to get very close with some additional woodiness, but it had that disgusting synthetic smell after it started to wear off. So no more of those duplicate synthetic fragrance oils or sprays for me. Every time I wear this fragrance, I get compliments from both men and women. I will say that the notes you smell in the beginning when you first spray it, are different from what it evolves into once it settles, as with most fragrances, so you have to give it some time. I have a cousin who hated this fragrance when she sprayed it on herself she did not really give it any time, but every time I wear it, she asks what I'm wearing. It smells so luxurious with just enough sweetness. The notes in this fragrance really blend well with each other and take me to some like fantasy almost like I myself am in one of those fragrance commercials! It def does not give old lady vibes I would say late 20s to early 40s and is very feminine and sexy even though it falls into a fresh scent category. I'm so surprised that it even has negative reviews, but to each his own. But then again in the same breath I'm glad its not so common. The only negative that I have to say about this fragrance is that doesn't last that long, but I love it so much I don't mind having to reapply it. But still 10/10 totally recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1659987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1659987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1654341" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1654341" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="phongbach"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1007296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="phongbach" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carner-Barcelona/Ibiza-Nights-59781.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59781.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ibiza Nights"title="Ibiza Nights"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1654341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1654341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007296">phongbach</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-27">09/27/22 18:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smell like the spa.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1654341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1654341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1607770" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1607770" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="neonaya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/779895"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.779895.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="neonaya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Woman-by-Ralph-Lauren-45741.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45741.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Woman by Ralph Lauren"title="Woman by Ralph Lauren"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1607770ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1607770" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/779895">neonaya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-21">07/21/22 11:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From the beginning it’s very dense scent despite the notes that are usually light and airy. I can smell bergamot, fig and salty creamy notes. Like expensive sun protection cream. I wouldn’t recommend it for heat cause it suffocates by its creamy saltiness and bold figs. I’m surprised that there are no fig leaves in the pyramid. May be it’s  combination of white flowers and benzoin  gives that annoying effect, but after one hour I wanted to wash it away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1607770"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1607770#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1600098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I have a 10ml decant and will probably throw it in the mix this summer, though. Recommend for men or women.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1600098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1600098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1587090" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
