Threw me off :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1570867"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1570867#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1560366" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1560366" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kimberry2219"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/525956"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.525956.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kimberry2219" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1560366ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1560366" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/525956">kimberry2219</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-09">05/09/22 10:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has become my mother in law’s signature scent over the last 2-3 years and she gets compliments left and right!! I highly recommend it for women 20 and above that want to grab people’s attention and get that question “what are you wearing??”</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1560366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1560366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1552266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1552266" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Violinhead8120"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302204"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Violinhead8120" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Golden-Decade-69404.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69404.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Golden Decade"title="Golden Decade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1552266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1552266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302204">Violinhead8120</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-27">04/27/22 17:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is nothing like I was hoping it would be. It’s a heavy synthetic vanilla powder bomb. It doesn’t smell like high quality materials were used. I can’t personally believe that this perfume was passed as a Private Blend, because it smells unlike any other Private Blend I’ve smelled, and that’s not really a good thing.<br />
<br />
First off, I can’t even smell the florals - I can only smell maybe a hint of jasmine after the opening settles in. Nothing else as far as florals are concerned. <br />
<br />
This is Very boring, very uninspired, and I don’t get the slightest bit of the feeling of the yin and yang that is associated to a cold snowbank and warm sunshine in this. I was hoping for somewhat of a cool iciness with a warm radiant solar note. But no, it’s a heavy, synthetic, dated, powdery vanilla linear boring mess on me. The longevity was expected - about 3 to 4 hours.<br />
<br />
Actually, the first perfume I thought of when I sprayed Soleil Neige was Dolce &amp; Gabbana The One EDP for women, which I also didn’t care for. I think I massively overpaid for this decant that I purchased.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1552266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1552266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1550585" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1550585" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ap528"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ap528" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1550585ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1550585" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453780">ap528</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-25">04/25/22 13:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you've been on a hunt for a warm, sunny yet not overly sweet nor heavy perfume, this is it! Perfection at its finest! Very beautiful, creamy, personally I even smell good coconut (not the cheap kind) at the top notes. Once it dries down and adjusts to your skin, it reminds me of Tom Ford's Noir Extreme toned down and more feminine.  It's not overwhelming on sweetness, which is hard to come across these days, yet it is on the warmer and sweeter side. Smells luxurious!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1550585"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1550585#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1547144" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1547144" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ceekel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1473792.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ceekel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1547144ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1547144" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); It keeps transforming as it drys down and throughout the day.  I can smell the carrot seed note and the white flowers and the vanilla.   This sits closer to the skin for sure.  If you don't like projecting fragrance then this nay be for you.  Tom Ford DNA but in my opinion not worth the coins</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1547144"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1547144#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1534215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Mysterious white floral with amber &amp; vanilla touches.<br />
I really can imagine "the serene shimmer of sun on snow" as the marketing stated.<br />
On my skin, it lasts quite a bit,  Around 5-6 hours.<br />
Yes, it's so soft though. Need Overspray for more sillage.<br />
Got compliments (+)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1486876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1486876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1468568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293601">Msc1977</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-22">12/22/21 14:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This to me, is not a unisex scent, it's very floral in a feminine way, and the dry down is very vanilla and musk.<br />
It's nice, but defo a woman's fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1468568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1468568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1437607" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1437607" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Plogic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/964475"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.964475.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Plogic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Ambre-Nuit-7092.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7092.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Nuit"title="Ambre Nuit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1437607ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1437607" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); There’s certainly a nod to Soleil Blanc, but instead of giving me that beach vibe, this is giving me a synthetic, motel pool meets fabric softener vibe; cloying and reeks of ‘new-money-no-taste’ imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Estee Lauder is killing Tom Ford. <br />

Performance 2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1423176"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1423176#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1420583" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1401073" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shokravee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1139090"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1139090.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shokravee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Molecule-01-Iris-66048.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66048.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Molecule 01 + Iris"title="Molecule 01 + Iris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1401073ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1401073" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1139090">shokravee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-29">08/29/21 21:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I REALLY DON'T GET TBE COMPARISONS (?) This is a bit sweet but not overly, like iced tea. This really does smell like iced tea to me when it dries down. The name seriously reflects how you will feel about this; a day fragrance in a ski ground under the sun just when the sun hits the snow. It is not similar to Soleil Blanc; don't let your mind go there. It's a very pleasant, very safe, not at all like Tom Ford. It's really not cheap smelling, in fact it's nothing like I've ever smelled but do i think it's worth the retail? MAYBE IF YOU ARE OK WITH PAYING THAT AMOUNT FOR A SAFE PERFUME (I wouldn't pay retail for it personally). Don't get me wrong, it's not inoffensive, people could still smell you but it's not an in your face scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1401073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1401073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1393116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; After 15 minutes it's just a generic powdery/benzoin/vanilla celebrity perfume that doesn't worth the $200+ tag price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1393116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1393116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1390399" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1390399" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="louis7391"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/518222"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="louis7391" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1390399ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1390399" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/518222">louis7391</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-11">08/11/21 05:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unique and perfectly titled. This is a very light airy unique flower/vanilla scent. For me it’s perfect for spring more than any other season. Opening is harsh however and not nice, but within 5 minutes it begins to settle and then it really clicks when the vanilla/benzoin notes come in. Very classy and ethereal, although also more suited to younger people (25-45). Unisex although it leans slightly feminine. I’d happily wear it, as a man there aren’t many scents like this. It’s more of a mood scent than a personality scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1390399"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1390399#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1385657" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1385657" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mustlovetravelanddogs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1034612"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1034612.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mustlovetravelanddogs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/The-Hedonist-69225.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69225.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Hedonist"title="The Hedonist"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1385657ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1385657" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1034612">mustlovetravelanddogs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-02">08/02/21 22:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Flowers soaking in a creamy vanilla softness. I am in love 💕</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1385657"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1385657#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1384534" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1384534" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GabbieSmithWindley"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1127109"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1127109.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GabbieSmithWindley" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Charogne-4512.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4512.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Charogne"title="Charogne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1384534ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1384534" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1127109">GabbieSmithWindley</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-31">07/31/21 13:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Creamy, bright, balmy, cool and warm at the same time. A reviewer below said it smells like "powdered lime blossom" and I think that is spot on. Back in the early 2000s, Bath and Body Works used to carry a scent called Rich Citrus Cream. This smells soooo close to that scent. Zesty lime, sweet cream, warm vanilla with a cool icy accord cutting through it. Tom Ford knocked it out of the park with this one. It's a crowd-pleasing scent, yet still manages to have a lil special something-something throughout the wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1384534"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1384534#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1383869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1383869" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ckorp8"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357605"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357605.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ckorp8" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Ananda-8331.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8331.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ananda"title="Ananda"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1383869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1383869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357605">ckorp8</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-30">07/30/21 06:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelling this perfume I can say that it’s rather fitting. The whole scent is so cooling and fresh, but not the sort of sharp coldness you get with mental, rather you get a soft light snow-like scent. There’s something there that brings out brightness in there, the soleil, as you close your eyes and take in the scent. This is not a dark gloomy one for sure, this Sun (lit) Snow scent. You can certainly vision the sparkling snow when you smell this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1383869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1383869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1378437" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1378437" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maya2000ro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/945717"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.945717.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="maya2000ro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Black-Opium-25324.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25324.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Opium"title="Black Opium"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1378437ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1378437" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/945717">maya2000ro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-19">07/19/21 14:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really love this one, but nor right away. At the first puff there's a note that moves my nose away, like some make up powder that went bad. After a while, it settles down, that note disappeares and a sweet classy scent comes out. It kind of makes you become addicted. I can definitely pick up some flowers and vanilla. All together it's a beautiful fragrance with a nice projection and longevity,( up to 6 hrs) .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1378437"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1378437#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1375449" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1375449" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wednesdaychild41"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1191239.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wednesdaychild41" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Papillon-Artisan-Perfumes/Epona-95954.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95954.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Epona"title="Epona"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1375449ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1375449" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); Smells like powdered Lime Blossom</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1375449"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1375449#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1368886" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1368886" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kterhark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/12596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.12596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kterhark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Agua-de-Sevilla/Agua-de-Naranjos-16229.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16229.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Agua de Naranjos"title="Agua de Naranjos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1368886ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1368886" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/12596">Kterhark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-01">07/01/21 09:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you are trying to decide if this is a sample you should buy, go ahead and pass.  Put it on your 'next time' list.  I enjoyed this fragrance when I first sniffed it, and even for the first half hour, but over a year of sampling it off and on I noticed something recurring:  Eventually this became to sweet for me, too synthetic, and too 'young'.  AT age 50, I like my scents to offer more maturity and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1368886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1368886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1367412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1367412" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="angelmarc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/885512"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.885512.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="angelmarc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Love-Don-t-Be-Shy-4322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Don't Be Shy"title="Love Don't Be Shy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1367412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1367412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/885512">angelmarc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-28">06/28/21 14:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think it's a very interesting fragrance because it smells different in every person, I made a try with 3 friends and It does take a different path for everyone. <br />
In my case, it starts with a lovely bergamot and neroli but then it starts to smell like the name, more warm and unique cozier. <br />
If I can describe as a situation for me it's like a summer day when you going to the beach and eat a popsicle, the water of the ocean is cold like hell but after that great day on the beach, you just go to rest take your towel and get wrap in the softness of it waiting for passing the chills of the air and the water and then you get warm.<br />
I don't know if I explain well.<br />
Just Try It<br />
The longevity is below other classiques from Tom Ford but it's above from the commercial.<br />
The sillage in myself is better than Soleil Blanc.<br />
A great Scent to change the usual in Spring and Summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1367412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1367412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1363174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1363174" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wlmyer2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/623492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.623492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wlmyer2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rogue-Perfumery/Derviche-53819.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53819.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Derviche"title="Derviche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1363174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1363174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); Very strange! I don’t get any white flowers. Still a cool scent though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1363174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1363174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1338355" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; syrupy sweet (benzoin/vanilla). smells like a cheap bath &amp; body works or victoria’s secret scent so not worth the money imo which says a lot cause i like wasting money on things. tom ford makes great scents, splurge on a different one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298043">alysch4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-06">02/06/21 17:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this is a very beautiful, creamy fragrance. Leans feminine, but I can see men wearing this if they like florals. I think this is mostly a Spring and Winter scent, but kind of has a suntan oil-ness to it like Soleil Blanc so I think it can suit the Summer. Sillage on me is more intimate/moderate and moderate longevity... wish both were a bit more which is probably why I won't buy a full size, but I am tempted to get a 15/30ml decant for Spring...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It is cold but there’s a slight of warmth, cheerfulness. The opening is fresh and sparkling then the floral notes and a bit of sweetness come. I blind bought this and no regrets at all. Perfect for skiing 😁 but in my opinion this can be worn all year round</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1276623"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1276623#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1275572" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1275572" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kirkdonn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1126808"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1126808.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kirkdonn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Black-Lacquer-95808.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95808.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Lacquer"title="Black Lacquer"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1275572ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1275572" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1126808">Kirkdonn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-13">01/13/21 17:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On me, this is a skin scent that opens as jasmine on chrome, then settles to vanilla on silver. Slightly icy, very one-dimensional. But I wore it skiing the other day, and I can totally see what TF had in mind when devising the visual brand for this juice: snow reflecting soleil, in a creamy metal base. When I started to sweat, the metal and ice notes took over.  Good for office in winter, and not too fem—at least on my skin. 4/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1275572"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1275572#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1275546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1275546" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Riverwind79"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1260786"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1260786.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Riverwind79" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Egoiste-Platinum-614.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.614.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Egoiste Platinum"title="Egoiste Platinum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1275546ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1275546" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1260786">Riverwind79</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-13">01/13/21 16:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells rather pleasant. I guess it is not meant to be a heavy scent perfume. As what it's called - Soleil Neige - Sun Snow, imagining in a forest/garden where the grounds are covered in snow, it is a clear blue sky with the sun shining through and rays of light passing through the tree branches as you look up. Feels a bit cold but there is warm coming.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1275546"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1275546#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1273976" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1273976" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bourcet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090870"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1090870.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bourcet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Rehab-50351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rehab"title="Rehab"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1273976ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1273976" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090870">bourcet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-10">01/10/21 20:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was a blind impulse buy. Put an Allure award on something and I'll buy it. I'm that basic. I have to say, for the price, the performance is absolute shit. Sure, you can get a couple hours of this with satisfactory projection, but after hour 2 this is nothing more than a skin scent. I'm sorry, but Estee Lauder's department store heavy hitters are better formulated than this. <br />
<br />
I will say, however, that the opening notes and how this fragrance unfolds is really interesting; maybe some will dislike the linearity of it, and I can agree, but there's something about the way the bergamot morphs into the jasmine that truly is evocative of sun shining on snow. The metallicness of the aldehydes is a bit weird on my skin, a bit like bathroom cleaner, but this doesn't last very long and is quickly on its way into Powder Town. <br />
<br />
The top floral accords, while pretty, are a bit too indolic for me. I continually struggle with labdanum; there's just something about that note that won't ever not smell like Pampers to me. The floral accords turn powdery pretty quickly and dry down to too much of a basic vanilla to have any sort of Tom Ford pizazz or panache worth paying for. I'm not sure if this will end up staying in my collection. I'm not super into smelling like diapers, regardless of any sort of Gstaad apres ski vibes Tom Ford is trying to sell here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1273976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1273976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1271406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1271406" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="a7_mad1991"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/988338"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.988338.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="a7_mad1991" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1271406ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1271406" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/988338">a7_mad1991</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-06">01/06/21 06:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very fem <br />
Wintery and mature</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1271406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1271406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1250063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1250063" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hfiebert"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231799"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hfiebert" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/H-The-Exclusive-Black-Tier-40361.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40361.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="H The Exclusive Black Tier"title="H The Exclusive Black Tier"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1250063ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1250063" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231799">hfiebert</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-18">11/18/20 07:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got a 7ml decant of this and I love it.  I think this works well in the cold weather, kind of reminds me of eating Fruit Loops on a snowy day.  Wish the projection was better but this will definitely be my next TF purchase.<br />
<br />
Update 11/25<br />
Bought a full bottle and absolutely love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1250063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1250063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1247868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1247868" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="genny17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/335005"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.335005.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="genny17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Flowers-Flames-95623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Flowers & Flames"title="Libre Flowers & Flames"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1247868ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1247868" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/335005">genny17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-12">11/12/20 16:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received it and after a couple days it is going back to Sephora..there is an underlying clean laundry detergent vibe in Soleil Neige, the top notes are crisp, almost sharp, it doesnt make me think of snow really.. the base is very soft and powdery, very pleasant, and then it is like basically gone...at $199 can for a 30 ml this is way too overpriced..it has similarities with some Clean perfumes which are as good and more affordable..it makes me think of Aventus for her too..not impressed honestly..so typical of TF fragrances, strong weird top notes and very soft bases, like it never varies...nothing special, not bad but not worth the price...far from it...the name fits, there is something white about this perfume, but the price is out of this world.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1244173" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aqua76239"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/19867"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.19867.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aqua76239" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Gold-Coast-56778.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56778.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold Coast"title="Gold Coast"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1244173ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1244173" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/19867">aqua76239</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-02">11/02/20 20:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had a sample of it so I liberally doused myself with it. I am VERY underwhelmed. It opens up with bit of citrus then it turns into super soft slightly powdery, sort of laundry clean scent, thats virtually undetectable. After ten minutes I couldn't smell it at all. I mean if I pressed my nose super hard into my skin maybe. <br />
Scent itself is not anything exceptional, and its NOT worthy steep price tag. I owned body sprays with more projection than this.<br />
PS name is rather apt I think since thats what i would imagine snow would smell like</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1244173"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1244173#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1228737" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is easily in my top 5 favorites from TF. A great freshie that can be pulled off any time of year</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1228737"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1228737#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1228403" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1203606">&mdash;}&mdash;@ darlingbud</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-24">09/24/20 12:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soleil Neige is what Anthropologie’s Nostalgia EDP Rose All Day wants to be but the Anthro version turns too vanilla and linear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1228403"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1228403#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1222500" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1222500" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scensitive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1226445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scensitive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Orchid-Soleil-38650.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38650.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orchid Soleil"title="Orchid Soleil"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1222500ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1222500" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226445">scensitive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-10">09/10/20 03:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>white vinyl eraser.  fresh fruit juice and rose shave ice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1222500"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1222500#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1197370" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1197370" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kots_Tanya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193200"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1193200.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kots_Tanya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfum-d-Empire/Un-Bel-Amour-D-ete-90980.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90980.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Un Bel Amour D’été"title="Un Bel Amour D’été"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1197370ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1197370" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193200">Kots_Tanya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-08">07/08/20 10:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So let me start by saying this is a Summer fragrance, I tried it in winter when it first came out and left a negative review that it opened up with a lot of Aldehydic note on my skin, which kind of smelled like toilet I won’t lie, but yesterday I tried it again and it was absolutely stunning with benzoin and Jasmin and orange blossom. It’s beautiful and intoxicating. I want a full bottle. I sprayed it on my hand along with Jasmin Rouge and caught a compliment the minute I walked out the Nordstrom. Yep, sillage is great. <br />
Another thing I was looking for is if the Shimmering oil smelled the same as the perfume and the answer is that it is very similar and for the most part the same but shimmering oil has more citrusy fresh aspect while perfume is a little more deep and the benzoin shines thru more what makes it so addicting to smell. Overall I love both and happy to have and use shimmering oil for now. I can only imagine how gorgeous it would be layered together. <br />
Again I don’t understand why Tom Ford came out with it in winter and marketed as winter snow something fragrance, when it’s absolutely summer frag.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1197370"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1197370#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1191521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1188004" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chicago Tony T"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/773746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.773746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chicago Tony T" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-430.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.430.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male"title="Le Male"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1188004ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1188004" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/773746">Chicago Tony T</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-13">06/13/20 16:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Floral and resinous. Gorgeous balsamic dry down. Benzoin has always been a favorite note of mine and it sparkles here. The florals are not animalic and not too feminine. Longevity is 8+hours while sillage is not the greatest but is acceptable. 100% unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1188004"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1188004#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1183453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
