I wear it at night.  Intriguing complex. Not your regular floral.  Tom ford strikes again</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1183453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1183453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1168959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1168959" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragLily"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235326"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1235326.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragLily" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1168959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1168959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235326">FragLily</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-28">04/28/20 06:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really love how this scent smells, I'm obsessed with it! The description of the sun reflecting the snow makes perfect sense to me. It has a cozyness but at the same time intriguing but not heavy at all.<br />
<br />
It is not a typical Tom Ford scent and i can understand the disappointment of some Tom Ford Fans. This scent is not daring not loud not bold. <br />
<br />
Soleil Neige is absolutely gorgeous and definitely a compliment getter!<br />
<br />
I don't get the bubble gum vibe others mentioned, for me its fresh floral with sweetness in the opening and then when it dries down beautifully balsamic Vanilla with musk. <br />
<br />
This scent is more a daytime scent and i think beside the name it can be worn any season, maybe not in the hottest days.<br />
<br />
The only negative thing I need to say is the performance. Longevity is good (8h+) but after 1-2 hours the scent is very close to the skin and almost no projection. <br />
I have to respray if I want to wear it the whole day. I don't bother respraying but at that price point that shouldn't be the case.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1168959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1168959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1149327" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1149327" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="disintigratedwoman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/764046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.764046.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="disintigratedwoman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Scarlet-Poppy-Intense-64551.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64551.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scarlet Poppy Intense"title="Scarlet Poppy Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1149327ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1149327" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/764046">disintigratedwoman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-02-25">02/25/20 13:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelled this for the first time today at Nordstrom - it's stunning! I get a strong, creamy vanilla note balanced with some bubble gum-like floral fruitiness.. smells synthetic but very unique and intriguing at the same time. Bright, cheery, feminine and strong. I picture it being ideal as a day scent for a happy, outgoing girl. <br />
<br />
One of my favourite Tom Ford frags to date. Might ask for a sample next time I pass through the store.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1149327"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1149327#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1146335" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1146335" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nathan Carpenter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1190617"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nathan Carpenter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-17.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermès"title="Terre d'Hermès"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1146335ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1146335" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); The opening is bad though...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1140865"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1140865#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1128855" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1115108" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LuxAestiva"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984343"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.984343.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LuxAestiva" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ermenegildo-Zegna/Mediterranean-Neroli-34030.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34030.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mediterranean Neroli"title="Mediterranean Neroli"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1115108ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1115108" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984343">LuxAestiva</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-11-12">11/12/19 15:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Extremely pleasant and pretty in the most mundane, synthetic and uninspiring way. A powdery, generic floral scent with a dominant, linear base of amber, benzoin and vanilla tones. Certain aspects of it remind me of Armani Code for Women, which is a lovely fragrance in my opinion, but the difference is that it is appropriately priced well under $100 while this new Tom Ford offering is a bloated $240. Tom Ford prices keep rising while the quality, originality and artistry keep falling as he flings out lukewarm, half-baked launches left and right. If you want a good laugh, try putting this next to a bottle of Tobacco Vanille, Noir de Noir, Tuscan Leather or Oud Wood. Time for a vacation, Tom.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1115108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1115108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1114858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1110825" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="greenbluegray"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/34396"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.34396.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="greenbluegray" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Trussardi/My-Name-18802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="My Name"title="My Name"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1110825ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1110825" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/34396">greenbluegray</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-29">10/29/19 10:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've just had my first sniff and am majorly reminded of those little skunk air fresheners you used to buy to hang from your rearview mirror in the 80s. At first that skunk was so horribly strong you knew it was a mistake to take it out of the plastic, but weeks after things off-gassed, you realized it was a nice smell after all. <br />
<br />
I love Soleil Blanc, and SN is nothing like that one. I find this very powdery and am still working on picking up the other notes. I don't mind notes of plastic and PlayDoh in fragrances, which is what attracted me to this. I also love benzoin.<br />
<br />
Now I am getting more flowers and vanilla. I will report back. :-)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1110825"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1110825#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1108694" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1108694" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="djhecutsa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1019196"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1019196.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="djhecutsa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Tony-Iommi-Monkey-Special-70789.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70789.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tony Iommi Monkey Special"title="Tony Iommi Monkey Special"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1108694ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1108694" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1019196">djhecutsa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-22">10/22/19 07:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm really enjoying Soleil Neige a lot! such a nice fragrance that fits both a cooler day and warmer fall/spring days. A clean fruity floral vanillic musk that starts off cold and warms up throughout the dry down. Besides the cool to warm effect this scent is pretty linear. The opening is what you get from beginning to end and doesn't change much but I really don't mind that at all. Soleil Neige is a lot more unisex and easy to wear than Soleil Blanc. Where Soleil Blanc was very floral and Coconut, Soleil Neige has a overdose of Vanilla and musk to town down the sweetness and balance the white florals. Im definitely impress with this release and I'm hoping we also see a lighter citrus version like we got with Eau de Soleil Blanc.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1108694"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1108694#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1107861" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1200433">marwaniq</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-19">10/19/19 09:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells white,floral and clean. not so unique and tbh i dont see myself wearing it. its a bit more fem but its amazing just as any tom ford fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1107861"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1107861#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1107707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1107707" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lmwimsatt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1049092"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1049092.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lmwimsatt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Love-in-White-4262.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4262.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love in White"title="Love in White"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1107707ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1107707" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1049092">lmwimsatt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-18">10/18/19 16:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unlike metallique, this is a hit. It's kind of a sweetened pheromone by marilyn miglin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1107707"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1107707#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1107072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1107072" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jroyogi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196737"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jroyogi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Azure-Lime-8706.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8706.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Azure Lime"title="Azure Lime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1107072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1107072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196737">jroyogi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-16">10/16/19 12:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice Tom Ford Private Blend, unisex but slightly fem, light, safe for office or close encounters</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1107072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1107072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1107040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1107040" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="landshark321"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/888664"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.888664.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="landshark321" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1107040ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1107040" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/888664">landshark321</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-16">10/16/19 09:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The latest Tom Ford Private Blend release is Soleil Neige, which translates to “sun snow,” presumably hinting that it’s a cold-weather daytime fragrance.  It has a sparkly, fresh floral quality to it, slightly sweet.  There’s some citrus hints (bergamot, orange blossom), but not much fruitiness, further distancing it from seemingly being crafted for the summer, despite being fairly light as it dries down into a mix of florals (jasmine, rose) and a smooth base of labdanum, benzoin, vanilla, and musk.  <br />
<br />
It definitely feels most appropriate as a daytime wear, and while having feminine touches, is fairly unisex, overall.  Some will find the floral / vanilla / musk blend to be inherently feminine, though, I’m sure, but I’d still encourage anyone to try it out as it’s fairly agreeable.<br />
<br />
As often is the case, the retail cost of a Tom Ford Private Blend fragrance, even on the lower end—currently $240 for 50ml—feels like a stretch, particularly for the relatively light offerings of the line, in contrast to the heavier, denser Tobacco Vanille, Noir de Noir, Tuscan Leather, etc., even in their reformulated incarnations.  Something like Soleil Neige is a tough sell, but I still think it’s a great fragrance and should be sought after on the secondary market or at a discount from retailers.<br />
<br />
Overall, I’m quite happy with Soleil Neige and will enjoy it year round, I think, as a primarily daytime option.<br />
<br />
8 out of 10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1107040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1107040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1105348" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1104110" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jardyd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209327"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jardyd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bois-des-Iles-1006.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1006.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois des Iles"title="Bois des Iles"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1104110ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1104110" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209327">jardyd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-05">10/05/19 15:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very pretty scent. It is floral, creamy with an almost detergent like smell, not in a bad way, it is soft and clean. <br />
<br />
I obtained a sample of this from my kind SA when purchasing another Tom Ford fragrance.  I wore to work several times this week and felt like I was enveloped in a pretty, clean soft creamy cloud.  Had to go back and get a full bottle this weekend.<br />
<br />
I think it can be worn year round, long lasting, leans feminine to me.  So far I have only worn this during the day, not sure if I would consider this a night time scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1104110"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1104110#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1099843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1099843" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dcjimr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1186069"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1186069.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dcjimr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1099843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1099843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1186069">dcjimr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-21">09/21/19 17:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tested this on me today at Neiman Marcus.  It is like nothing else I've smelled from Tom Ford.  It really packs a punch on the opening notes, which I detect mainly as balsamic citrusy florals.  I have no idea what carrot seeds smell like, but I suppose they're in the mix, too.  I really like it but in the same way one likes modern classical music.  It's best when you're in the auditorium watching it being performed live by an orchestra.  You're not really going to be lounging around the house in your pajamas listening to it. The same thing with this scent.  I imagine it would be great as a scent you would wear to a holiday party where everyone's dressed up.  I'm not going to wear it on a day to day basis.  But it's awesome nevertheless and it lasts forever.  8 hours later and I'm still getting the scent wafting up from my arm where I spayed it only once.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Cant wait to try it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1093800"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1093800#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1093744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1093744" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="binker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138305"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="binker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Le-Parfum-94983.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94983.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Le Parfum"title="MYSLF Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1093744ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1093744" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138305">binker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-02">09/02/19 13:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got this back in July not knowing the notes until now. On my skin it starts out fresh floral sweet &amp; reminds me of juicy fruit gum or that zebra stripe gum then far in the dry down kinda get that metallique vanilla vibe. On my gfs skin it’s much more floral &amp; feminine. Been testing it in the high heat of summer but can’t wait to test it out in the colder months as the name &amp; descrition describes sun reflecting off the snow.  A very different scent smells really really good but I like it not a love as it’s a little too feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1093744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1093744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1093738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Been testing it in the high heat of summer but can’t wait to test it out in the colder months as the name &amp; descrition describes sun reflecting off the snow.  A very different scent smells really really good but I like it not a love as it’s a little too feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1093744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1093744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1423176" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It could be clever marketing, but I picture the sun shimmering on the snow with this juice. <br />
<br />
But sadly, this only lasted maybe 45 minutes before it was a skin scent. <br />
Wears like it's an EDC!<br />
Estee Lauder is killing Tom Ford. <br />
<br />
Scent 7.5/10<br />
Performance 2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1423176"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1423176#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1197370" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1197370" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kots_Tanya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193200"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1193200.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kots_Tanya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfum-d-Empire/Un-Bel-Amour-D-ete-90980.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90980.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Un Bel Amour D’été"title="Un Bel Amour D’été"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1197370ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1197370" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193200">Kots_Tanya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-08">07/08/20 10:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So let me start by saying this is a Summer fragrance, I tried it in winter when it first came out and left a negative review that it opened up with a lot of Aldehydic note on my skin, which kind of smelled like toilet I won’t lie, but yesterday I tried it again and it was absolutely stunning with benzoin and Jasmin and orange blossom. It’s beautiful and intoxicating. I want a full bottle. I sprayed it on my hand along with Jasmin Rouge and caught a compliment the minute I walked out the Nordstrom. Yep, sillage is great. <br />
Another thing I was looking for is if the Shimmering oil smelled the same as the perfume and the answer is that it is very similar and for the most part the same but shimmering oil has more citrusy fresh aspect while perfume is a little more deep and the benzoin shines thru more what makes it so addicting to smell. Overall I love both and happy to have and use shimmering oil for now. I can only imagine how gorgeous it would be layered together. <br />
Again I don’t understand why Tom Ford came out with it in winter and marketed as winter snow something fragrance, when it’s absolutely summer frag.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1197370"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1197370#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="56737" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1115108" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1115108" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LuxAestiva"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984343"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.984343.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LuxAestiva" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ermenegildo-Zegna/Mediterranean-Neroli-34030.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34030.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mediterranean Neroli"title="Mediterranean Neroli"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1115108ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1115108" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984343">LuxAestiva</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-11-12">11/12/19 15:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Extremely pleasant and pretty in the most mundane, synthetic and uninspiring way. A powdery, generic floral scent with a dominant, linear base of amber, benzoin and vanilla tones. Certain aspects of it remind me of Armani Code for Women, which is a lovely fragrance in my opinion, but the difference is that it is appropriately priced well under $100 while this new Tom Ford offering is a bloated $240. Tom Ford prices keep rising while the quality, originality and artistry keep falling as he flings out lukewarm, half-baked launches left and right. If you want a good laugh, try putting this next to a bottle of Tobacco Vanille, Noir de Noir, Tuscan Leather or Oud Wood. Time for a vacation, Tom.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1115108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1115108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1105348" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1105348" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frankie12"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1099530"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frankie12" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1105348ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1105348" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1099530">Frankie12</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-09">10/09/19 18:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A 70's playboy bunny from a small town wearing Avons Sweet Honesty  .....</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1105348"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1105348#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1509412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1509412" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="islandgirlmaranda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1255474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="islandgirlmaranda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Nettare-di-Sole-66360.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66360.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Nettare di Sole"title="Aqua Allegoria Nettare di Sole"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1509412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1509412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255474">islandgirlmaranda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-21">02/21/22 21:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Received the travel spray. I've been testing it out a couple days. This has got to be the oddest perfume I have ever smelled. It's not stinky. But it also doesn't smell good either. It's just WEIRD. I don't know who would want to smell like that. I just really don't know what TF was trying to go for with this one. I have a new travel spray if anyone's interested. Not keeping this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1509412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1509412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1437607" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1437607" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Plogic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/964475"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.964475.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Plogic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Ambre-Nuit-7092.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7092.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Nuit"title="Ambre Nuit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1437607ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1437607" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/964475">Plogic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-30">10/30/21 22:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Though there’s some feeling of quality here, the end result is, for me, a bit of a flop. There’s certainly a nod to Soleil Blanc, but instead of giving me that beach vibe, this is giving me a synthetic, motel pool meets fabric softener vibe; cloying and reeks of ‘new-money-no-taste’ imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1437607"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1437607#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1318439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1318439" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="modernwarpaint"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204162"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1204162.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="modernwarpaint" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Noir-29-31872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Noir 29"title="The Noir 29"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1318439ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1318439" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); Not a fan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="56737"comment_id="1318439"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html?ccid=1318439#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="56737" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
